## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `npm run type-check` and it passes
- [ ] I have run `npm run lint` and fixed any issues

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions/classes
- [ ] I have updated type definitions

### Security
- [ ] I have not introduced any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information
- [ ] I have not added any dependencies with known vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have followed secure coding practices

### Performance
- [ ] My changes do not negatively impact performance
- [ ] I have considered the bundle size impact
- [ ] I have optimized images (if applicable)
- [ ] I have considered lazy loading (if applicable)

### Accessibility
- [ ] My changes are accessible (WCAG AA compliant)
- [ ] I have tested with keyboard navigation
- [ ] I have added appropriate ARIA labels
- [ ] I have tested with a screen reader (if applicable)
